name: Where No Fear Was
description:
"Where No Fear Was" is a FREE traditional Point and Click adventure game set in a dark, strange yet also familiar world, filled with unique characters. Follow one woman's path of revenge, through fear, uncertainty and disappointment. Befriend grumpy trees, outsmart thieving raccoons and confront the man responsible for a great tragedy.

The graphics for this game were created by Manthos Lappas: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ManthosArt

Additional graphics and voice-overs created by Shir Dahan: https://www.instagram.com/theshiroosh/
